unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent, especially from institutions like IIT Delhi. Our firm starts recruitment drives on 10/10/2024. We look for candidates with skills relevant to the Indian market. Expect interviews around 14:00 hrs in Bangalore. Performance bonuses can reach Rs. 50,000. Application deadline: 30/09/2024. Wishing all applicants the best! Happy Diwali in advance! Join us to build Bharat.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent, especially from institutions like I I T Delhi. Our firm starts recruitment drives on tenth October two thousand and twenty four. We look for candidates with skills relevant to the Indian market. Expect interviews around fourteen hundred hours in Bangalore. Performance bonuses can reach rupee fifty thousand. Application deadline: thirtieth September two thousand and twenty four. Wishing all applicants the best! Happy Diwali in advance! Join us to build Bharat.
